extendedInfo.description: The easiest World Edit tool for Minecraft Pocket Edition! It FLOATS right over your screen!You can use this app to edit your worlds without ever needing to leave the game!!!**+---+---+---+---+---+NOW, easily switch between creative and survival worlds with one click using the smartest World Edit tool for Minecraft PE!+---+---+---+---+---+The app automatically recognizes which world you would like to edit and then uses that world while editing!**The app is designed for SINGLE PLAYER worlds.Here is the link to the example video:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MYPo3itr378+---+---+---+---+---+Did you ever wish that you could copy your house from one world to another? How about turn your boring one story house into a sky scraper? Or what about make your "beach front" house, actually face the ocean by rotating it? Or what about replacing all the wood in your log cabin to diamond blocks instead ( To avoid fires of course ;) )?Well, now you can!!! Just by using World Edit for MCPE! It floats right over everything else so editing your worlds is a breeze! It includes options such as:+Copy+Paste+Delete+Replace+Replace All+Replicate Up+Fill+AND Rotations!Also includes a video tutorial and a picture tutorial on how to use this amazing tool!*Please note: This app is a tool for Minecraft, it is NOT Minecraft itself and is NOT affiliated with Mojang in any way, it is only a WORLD EDIT tool for Minecraft Pocket Edition**Please note that this application sometimes may not work right if you have mods installed in Minecraft PE

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: I was making a underground house but now i can use world edit to make that possible. You should make it so you can edit your inventory too.     :D
reviews.author: Jace Schlechter

reviews.title: Well worth it!
reviews.comment: Tricky at first,  but you get used to it quickly. Some features that would be nice would be Move/slide selection by x blocks,  and the ability to save objects into a prefab library,  and \"re-seed\" which reruns the seeding algorithm within the selected area.

reviews.author: Dante Perez

reviews.title: Does The Dirty Work For Me
reviews.comment: I am making a castle with large walls of dirt at the side. It would take me five minutes to manually form a few walls. Now, I can use the fill feature to make ten walls a minute. I\'m very glad that I came across this application because I was tired of taking so much time to build walls. You can also delete large chunks of mountains in no time. It takes a while to get a hang of it, but just make a new world in creative and practice using the cool features, it\'s totally worth it! \360\237\214\237\360\237\214\237\360\237\214\237\360\237\214\237\360\237\214\237
